article: When Rick was born, somehow his umbilical cord wrapped his neck.This left him brain-damaged and unable to _ his arms and legs."He'll be vegetative for the rest of his life." the _ declared.But his father, David, didn't _ it.He noticed the way Rick's eyes _ him around the room, and wanted so _ to help his son communicate.
